Description:
Control Risks' Crisis and Security Consulting practice is growing in APAC, and we have a great opportunity for a competent and experienced security professional to join our busy and high-performing Security Design Engineering team in Mumbai, with some flexibility to be based in Delhi, or remotely in India.This role will involve working on various security-led projects across the South-east Asia region by providing support to Control Risks' senior design team with the design deliverables.Reporting to the Director of Design Engineering Solutions APAC, key duties will involve:Deliver and/or support security design consultancy assignments ranging from simple to complex tasks.
Support and assist the Senior Design Consultants in drafting design stage documents such as technical specification documents, power loads calculation, tender evaluation reports, etc.
Participate in client meetings where required.
Keep abreast with advances in security technology.
Complete assigned tasks within the given time frames.
Attend onsite inspections and testing & commissioning.Job Details
